commits.message:
Merge pull request #461 from eucalyptus/GUI-348

GUI-348 fixed label class in user editor
GUI-348: Fix status colors on instances landing page table view

Merge pull request #327 from eucalyptus/GUI-348

GUI-348: Fix path to refresh button's SVG icon on landing pages
GUI-348: Style wizard tab colors for consistency
GUI-348: Misc CSS fixes, take two
GUI-348: Quick fix to convert sub-nav links to tabs for create scaling policy page.
GUI-348: Add sections to detail pages.
GUI-348: Quick style fix for file input field.
GUI-348: Move Chosen widget CSS to master template since we're pretty much using it everywhere.
GUI-348 fixed label class in user editor
GUI-348: Center-align progress indicator percentage on snapshots landing page

Merge pull request #325 from eucalyptus/GUI-348

GUI-348: More CSS updates
GUI-348: Few more pixel tweaks to landing page styles

Merge pull request #293 from eucalyptus/GUI-348

GUI-348: SVG icons for dashboard

Merge pull request #183 from eucalyptus/GUI-348

GUI-348: Update styles to better match latest mockups
GUI-348: .panel.has-title is now .panel.has-actions

Merge pull request #448 from eucalyptus/GUI-348

GUI-348: More style fixes
GUI-348: Fix tile/table switcher icon colors on landing pages
GUI-348: Fix text color of drop-down menu items on landing pages.

Merge pull request #306 from eucalyptus/GUI-348

GUI-348: More CSS updates
GUI-348: Misc CSS fixes for landing pages.  Add title to images, instances, and volumes landing page.

Merge pull request #291 from eucalyptus/GUI-348

GUI-348: CSS changes for consistency with latest design comps
GUI-348: Fix typo
GUI-348: Style changes for security group rules editor to be somewhat consistent with tag editors
GUI-348: More progress updating styles for landing pages.
GUI-348: Set color of current tile/table view icon to black instead of grey
GUI-348: Bump up tile width a bit, and add shadow to sorting drop-down on landing pages
GUI-348: Fix padding of help expando on create volume page
GUI-348: Fix title on Add policy page
GUI-348: More CSS changes for landing pages and various components on detail pages (e.g. expandos).
GUI-348: CSS changes for consistency with latest design comps
GUI-348: Convert sub-nav items to tabs on instance, volume, and scaling group detail pages.
GUI-348: Override default Chosen widget styles for consistency with design comps
GUI-348: Align "completed" text in snapshot tile on volume-snapshots page
GUI-348: Animated progress bars?  Yeah, we got 'em
GUI-348: Fix alignment of create/import key pair button on create key pair page
GUI-348: Fix path to refresh button's SVG icon on landing pages
GUI-348: More CSS changes, and add titles to most pages for GUI-362
GUI-348: Swap users/groups tiles on dashboard to match design comps
GUI-348: Style detail page section headers
GUI-348: Style tag editor.  Style dropdown menus on landing pages.
GUI-348: Style changes for login page

Merge pull request #398 from eucalyptus/GUI-348

GUI-348: Animated progress bar; style updates for user detail page
GUI-348: Fix formatting of help expando text in modals
GUI-348: Fix alignment of help content on detail pages with tabs.

Merge pull request #297 from eucalyptus/GUI-348

GUI-348: Another round of CSS changes
GUI-348: Add SVG icons to dashboard
GUI-348: Use h6 rather than h4 for section titles on detail pages.
GUI-348: Minor tweaks to tile/table item dropdowns
GUI-348: Style fixes for instance-volumes and volume-snapshots page.
GUI-348: Initial progress on updating landing page styles to match mockups
GUI-348: Misc CSS fixes for user detail page

Merge pull request #390 from eucalyptus/GUI-348

GUI-348: More CSS changes
GUI-348: Fix padding for disabled tabs in Launch Instance and Launch Config wizards
Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-348
GUI-348: Prevent flash of Angular template expressions on dashboard while item counts are loading
GUI-348: Minor tweak to Launch Instance button on dashboard
GUI-348: Minor style tweak for refresh button on landing pages.  Allow filtering of volumes by instance name on volumes landing page.
GUI-348: Style Autoscale tag editor to be consistent with standard tag editor
GUI-348: Initial progress on updating styles for detail pages
